page.title: 09HEALTH & WELFARE
page.content: Opticians,Chiropodists,Dentists & {Doctors}practices are situated in Bungay(4 miles) & Harleston(5 miles) Community health workers making calls in Denton are:Midwives,nurses,health visitors & social workers.Doctors will make house calls in an emergency.Fire, {Police }& Ambulance emergency services are available by dialling 999 on the telephone.A constable based in Harleston has special responsibility for Denton.Any inhabitant requiring {hospital}admission goes to the Norfolk & Norwich hospital(Norwich) about 19 miles away:or the James Paget hospital (Gorleston)about 24 miles away.Small hospitals at Beccles,Halesworth & Ditchingham do minor operations.Most {maternity}cases are admitted to a main hospital & discharged 48 hours after birth to the community staff.Only 5% of babies are born at home.
